name: Tiny Invaders (itch)
description:
Tiny Invaders A Space Invaders clone that doesn't take it so seriously

Hi guys, 

this is me, Francesco Clementoni aka Arturo Dente, with my new brand "Back to the 8 bit" , that I use to release my C64 games and demo, with an eye to 80s / 90s myths.

This game is Tiny Invaders, a clone of the most famous shooter game, but with some cool features:

  • A Sci-Fi plot, where aliens come to Earth to kidnap our cows, and you are a farmer with a huge technology to kick their as**s
  • Plenty of levels with subliminal messages shaped by aliens disposition
  • End level boss fight
  • Trainer for infinite energy and level skipping
  • Intro music from a famous piece of 70s/80s age. Da da da!
  • Quotes from the great, big, mighty game of 90s, Du** Nu** 3d (I leave blank for eventual copyright issues)
  • Irony everywhere

Come on, what are you waiting for, Christmas?
